column5: I like it Bushart. When I clicked on the larger image I was immediately drawn into it. And after a few minutes you catch yourself starting to daydream. Nice piece.
Thanks Fish---I daydream lots as well
Your painting skills are certainly expanding.  This one is a beauty. Kinda like living in a dream.  Many thanks for sharing!
Thanks EHG
So I spun a differnt Idea---and yes--again a fishin rod  Called "Lazy River Constellation" 24 x 36
Nice work.
Thanks Fisherman---it was really fun to do
nice
Thanks Terry
Kinda looks like Norman Rockwell went sci-fi I really like it.  :clapping:
EXCELLENT !!!
Thanks Pikeslayer and Mercman  I was actually thinking of Norman Rockwell when I painted this
I like it!
very cool
Thanks N.A.W. and GBW  I'm really tired of paintin trees
Wheres the downriggers Terrance? LOL  As always,you do great work.
Thanks Bri
Very nice...  Really like it  Like a cross between the kid fishing from the moon at the start of a film... And Tom sawyer
Thanks Musky M---I had Huck Finn cross my mind
Very Cool, I love it!!!  Maureen
You have quite the talent sir!,great job.
My Girlfriend just asked me if thats a Norman Rockwell!!!  Then came the I have to have it and how much...do you sell them?

Thanks a bunch Maureen, Davey and Tightline  I avoid biz here on the board Tightline---TJ lets me show the works I've done and I'm happy to share them with my fellow anglers and hunters as a member  But the biz end--I keep away from here
That looks awesome! Love your use of colour! You have a great talent!
Thats my favourite so far bushart! As always, great work!

They say..."its a fine line between genius and insanity"....so would i be considered a whacko if i thought the concept was genius???  Awesome work Terrence thanks for enlightening us with your talent..
Sorry for the delay folks--been giving out the halloween goods  Thanks a lot Miracon and Jigger and thanks Twocoda for the kind words---I figure artwork is to be seen by as many as possible
REALLY like it!
Thanks Jewelbee  It seems to be getting some pretty positive reviews out there in the world---Guess I just had to think outside the box on this one-----and head into space
